Summary: Military jet planes going after a bluish/white light
divs: sighting detailson april 13th, around 2 am (which technically is the early morning of the 14th) i was awakened by the sound of military jets flying over my home. i live right on the arlington\falls church border, about 10 minutes from dc and the pentagon, so i am very familiar with the sound differences between commercial and military planes. i looked out the window and saw a bluish\white light flash, several times, in different positions each time. it was a cloudy night and each time the light flashed, it lit up the cloud cover near it. i heard the jets clearly, as they were quite loud, but did not see them, probably due to the cloud cover. i have never seen an object flash the way this one had, or move positions so quickly (and none of the positions were linear). i do believe there was a ufo over the skys of falls church that night, and military jets where deployed to intercept.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Falls Church
There was one other sighting in Falls Church on or around April 13th 2011
